attributes.action: Halt all deportations of refugees to the Congo until the foreign and commonwealth office recognises it as a place safe enough for British citizens to make non-essential journeys to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Government is still returning people, including young children,  to the Congo to face an uncertain future despite it not being safe enough for British travellers to visit. If it is not safe enough for British citizens how can it be safe for children?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
